name: Mojon Twins Gran Sabiduría: 31 in 1 Real Games
description:
Mojon Twins Gran Sabiduría: 31 in 1 Real Games is a collection of 31 games, prototypes and demos based on new and existing projects by the Spanish group Mojon Twins, designed after an Asian pirate cartridge. Many of the games are entirely new, but for the ones based on existing projects it is the first time they are available in NES format as almost all of them were previously made for the ZX Spectrum. Some of the titles available in the menu only reveal their real title when you start playing them. Some games are also reskins or variants of other included titles, with a new twist on the gameplay, mechanics or visuals.

The included titles are:
  • Aliens
  • Los amores de Brunilda (Cheril of the Bosque en otro Bosque variant)
  • Baboon!
  • Cheril Begins
  • Cheril the Nine
  • Encuera Women in the Azoteaw!
  • Encuera Women in the Desiertow!
  • Encuera Women in the Pantanow!
  • Espinette (Sonic Mal)
  • Espinete conoce a Ana (Sonic Mal)
  • Espinete Strikes Back (Sonic Mal)
  • I.O.T.Z.M. (Zombie Calavera: Prologue variant)
  • Jet Puri
  • Journey to the Centre of the Nose (demo - Viaje al centro de la napia variant)
  • Lala's P*P*P*P
  • Lala Lah
  • The Legend of Zelda III (Cheril of the Bosque variant)
  • Mega Meghan
  • Memory Somari
  • Monona Ninona Pana
  • Ninjajar: The Prologue
  • Ninjajar You Are Drunk!
  • Poti Poti Grufas
  • The Rendezvous
  • Sgt. Helmet's Commandow!
  • Somari Katamari
  • Sonic the Hedgehog (Sonic Mal)
  • Sonic 2 (Sonic Mal)
  • Sonic 3 of the Bosque (Sonic Mal)
  • Trabajo Basura (Dire Job)
  • Vesta Vaal (prototype)
All games can be selected from the main menu right away. There is also an item called An Incredible Customizer that allows players to directly hack into the ROM changing values, leading to new and unexpected (and most often unplayable) variants of the included games.

Sgt. Helmet's Commandow title screen
Sgt. Helmet's Commandow gameplay with the light green character as the protagonist
Cheril of the Bosque title screen
Cheril of the Bosque: avoid the mushroom and push the boxes to create a passage.
Cheril of the Bosque: push the boxes to get to the key. When stuck, leave the screen to reset the room.
Sonic Mal is the title screen for one of the many Sonic variants.
Sonic Mal: familiar colours and rings
Sonic Mal: jump on top of the creature to kill it.

Encuera Women in the Pantanow! gameplay as you move vertically through the level, similar to Commando.

Cheril the Nine: destroy the pink spawning points.

The Rendezvous: playing with the first character.

The Rendezvous: when one of the two manages to reach the other, the game is won.

Encuera Women in the Desiertow!: clearly a desert!

Playing the Sonic 2 variant.
